QAPair.Question: What is (are) Chemical dependence - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are a good resource for information on drug dependence: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/pwid/addiction.html , National Institute on Drug Abuse -- nida.nih.gov , Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration -- www.samhsa.gov , USA.gov -- www.usa.gov/mental-health-substance-abuse , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/drugsandyoungpeople.html ,
